opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Aldrich v. Johnson, Executive Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice

opinion:
543 U.S. 921

ALDRICH
v.
JOHNSON, EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF CRIMINAL JUSTICE, ET AL.

No. 04A285.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 12, 2004.

1

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death, presented to JUSTICE SCALIA, and by him referred to the Court, denied.
